```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(janeaustenr)
```

```{r}
pride <- prideprejudice
```

```{r}
pride <- tibble(
  id = 1: length(prideprejudice),
  text = prideprejudice
) %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

pride
```

```{r}
pride %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pride_word <- pride %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

pride_word
```

```{r}
pride_sentiments <- pride_word %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing")) 

pride_sentiments
```
